about_the_game:
Bring the corners of your screen to life with CHIMERA CAPSULE, a compact auto-RPG! As a reclusive alchemist, transmute and upgrade a menagerie of goofy minions, and form squads of vibrant monster girls to conquer dungeons in turn-based combat. If making friends is too hard, just create them!

What is CHIMERA CAPSULE?

CHIMERA CAPSULE is a party-building auto-battler, a creature collector and an incremental management idle game in a compact, multi-window package. Imagine transmuting bits of Shin Megami Tensei and Darkest Dungeon into Princess Connect, and then shrinking it down!

Homunculus Haven

You are Demiurge, a mysterious alchemist who uncovered a method for creating life. After your first homunculus caused an uproar among your peers, you were exiled to an abandoned laboratory in a remote land teeming with monsters and demi-humans.
Now, along with your new artificial assistant, Magnum, it is time to settle in, and populate the lab with all sorts of alchemical friends!

Transmute new beings to life

Your primary method of making new companions is through Transmutation, consuming Prima Materia to create homunculi.
For this purpose, CHIMERA CAPSULE features a gentle, mini gacha system, without the unhealthy bits!
No buying Transmutations through microtransactions, no hoarding currencies for months, no predatory practices and, because even duplicates are useful, no immeasurable disappointment that ruins your day!

Collectible & Incremental Menagerie

Create Minions and Chimeras, two types of collectible homunculi with distinct roles.
Minions are a diverse array of goofy creatures that gather materials for you, while Chimeras can venture into dungeons!
Both types can be upgraded and fused, increasing their efficiency or combat ability.

Noisy Neighbors

Your new home is surrounded by dangerous dungeons that need to be dealt with in order to make every day in the lab more peaceful.
You can form squads of Chimeras and send them on expeditions, to fight monsters through a turn-based auto-battle system, and bring back new loot and Prima Materia after clearing a floor.
Unlock progressively tougher dungeons as you conquer each one!
Each Chimera has her own set of unlockable abilities, allowing you to build efficient parties with powerful synergies.



Transmute, Manage, Upgrade, Conquer, Repeat! And who knows, maybe you’ll make new friends along the way!

Big Lab, Tiny Windows

CHIMERA CAPSULE is designed for passive, multitask-friendly gameplay. Its small windows (480 x 256) can be conveniently placed anywhere on your screen, and don’t get in the way of your other activities. Your Minions and Chimeras keep doing their thing in the background as long as the main window isn’t closed, and won’t impact your machine’s performance much!

Key Features

  • A vibrant cast of monster girls, from Redwig the blade-dancer pirate doll to Poxie, the plague doctor fairy.
  • A quirky collection of creatures, including ferrets, rocks with legs, corgis and confused salarymen!
  • Gacha system without the infamous bits, such as microtransactions.
  • Dungeons to conquer, that get bigger and more challenging as you progress!
  • Turn-based, auto-battle combat with deep party-building strategy.
  • An upgrade system in which you can consume materials to strenghten your roster.
  • A fusion system, to merge Minions with each other for funny (and more efficient) results!
  • Chimeras can be fused with their duplicates to unlock new abilities.
  • Tiny, unobtrusive game windows that don’t constantly require your attention. Perfect for multitasking!

CHIMERA CAPSULE is currently in development, by a passionate team of two people. We can't wait to show you more of it in the upcoming months!

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Linux distribution released after 2016
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E8200
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics 2500 (Ivy Bridge), AMD Radeon R5 Graphics (Kaveri)
  • Additional Notes: Appropriate screen dimensions for at least two 480x256 windows
